I'm honored to be a member of the EMUTrend Explorers project team.

Below, you'll find a brief summary of our project. To access a detailed project description, please go to (https://github.com/emu-hacettepe-analytics/emu430-fall2023-team-emutrend_explorers) .

**Summary**

*Analyzing Preference Patterns: A Study on Industrial Engineering Programs in Ankara*

This brief summarizes a study looking at the preferences of Ankara's industrial engineering programs. The project aim is to examine how these programs affect students' preferences by looking at program preference trends and locating possible contributing elements. Preference rates, student motivation for choosing a school, noteworthy program features, and future expectations could all be important study topics. The intention is to provide insight into how students see and select Ankara's industrial engineering degrees.
